definition[0]: a clear bitter-tasting drink that you can mix with alcoholic drinks such as gin or vodka
example[0]: She sat and sipped a gin and tonic.
definition[1]: a drink that you have as a medicine to give you more energy or strength when you feel tired
example[1]: A lot of people need a tonic at the end of the winter.
definition[2]: something that makes you feel happy and full of energy
example[2]: A weekend by the sea was the perfect tonic.
definition[3]: a liquid that you put on your hair or skin to improve it and make it more healthy
definition[4]: the first note in a musical scale of eight notes
